articles.title: African regional bodies reject Israel's recognition of Somaliland - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump said he won't quickly follow Mideast ally Israel in recognizing Somaliland, saying he needed to "study" it.
articles.content:
Africa's regional governance bodies on Saturday rejected Israel's recognition of Somalia's breakaway region of Somaliland as an independent nation, a day earlier.
Somaliland, a territory of more tha… [+2676 chars]
